description: hairy-faced, horned figure wearing short skirt and bare feet; holding a T-shaped staff in proper right hand and an alms book in proper left hand; an umbrella is strapped to his back
markings: two areas of untranslated inscriptions, at back of skirt on proper left leg and on front of alms book; lender\'S tag, at holes on back
title: (Penitent Oni)
